refnamediv.refpurpose: simple script to combine restart files

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.simpara: combine_restarts will use the correct combine utility (mppnccombine or combine-ncc) to combine any restart files that reside in the currrent working directory. combine_restarts uses the same options used in the FRE workflow.
